name: Zoey, the Jam Seeker
description:
It's a game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #5.

With the theme being PASSAGE. In this game you play as Zoey, who messed up with a time machine and broke time. At least, now she can control the passage of time, and will use these amazing powers... to get some JAM!

Made by me, @ivanfmoraes, @luisArantes and @MiguelScatolin
